Javascript + Math Homework

October 3rd, 2018

An Amtrak's Northeast Regional train from New York City to Boston travels at an average speed of 55 miles per hour and takes 4.2 hours to complete the journey. The Acela train completes the same distance in 3.5 hours. How fast does it go?
Amtrak train's speed: 55 miles/hour.
It completes the journey in 4.2 hours.
Therefore the distance to Boston is 55 * 4.2 = 231 miles.
The Acela train completes the same trip in 3.5 hours.
